products.name: Acer Predator Helios 300
products.description: Experience next-level gaming performance with the Acer Predator Helios 300, a powerhouse laptop designed for serious gamers and creative professionals. Featuring a blazing fast Intel Core i7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, and a vibrant 15.6-inch Full HD display with a 144Hz refresh rate, it delivers smooth, immersive visuals and responsive gameplay. Engineered for durability and optimal cooling, the Helios 300 ensures peak performance during intense sessions. Elevate your gaming and productivity with this premium machine built to keep you ahead of the competition.

products.name: ASUS ROG Strix G15 Gaming Laptop
products.description: Experience unstoppable gaming power with the ASUS ROG Strix G15 Gaming Laptop, engineered for serious gamers and content creators. Featuring a blazing fast AMD Ryzen processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, it delivers smooth, immersive gameplay and stunning visuals. Its sleek design and advanced cooling system ensure peak performance during marathon sessions, making it the ultimate choice for those who demand excellence in every frame. Elevate your gaming experience with a laptop built to dominate.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.description: Experience unmatched performance and sleek design with the Dell XPS 13, the ultimate laptop for professionals and creatives on the go. Featuring a stunning InfinityEdge display, powerful Intel processors, and all-day battery life, it delivers seamless multitasking and vibrant visuals in a compact, lightweight chassis. Engineered for those who demand excellence, the XPS 13 combines cutting-edge technology with premium craftsmanship to elevate your productivity and style.

products.name: CyberPowerPC Gamer Xtreme VR
products.description: Experience next-level gaming with the CyberPowerPC Gamer Xtreme VR, engineered for enthusiasts seeking immersive performance and stunning visuals. Powered by the latest high-speed processors and cutting-edge NVIDIA graphics, this Gaming PC delivers seamless VR-ready gameplay and lightning-fast responsiveness. Its sleek design and advanced cooling system ensure reliable, long-lasting performance, making it the perfect choice for gamers who demand power and precision. Elevate your gaming setup with a machine built to dominate every battlefield.

products.name: NZXT Player: One Custom PC
products.description: Elevate your gaming experience with the NZXT Player: One Custom PC, engineered for serious gamers seeking unparalleled performance and style. Powered by the latest high-speed processors and advanced graphics, this custom-built rig delivers seamless gameplay and stunning visuals. With premium cooling solutions and a sleek, modern design, the Player: One ensures both reliability and aesthetic appeal. Perfect for competitive gamers and enthusiasts, it’s the ultimate choice for dominating every match with confidence.

products.name: Logitech G Pro X Gaming Headset
products.description: Experience unparalleled audio precision with the Logitech G Pro X Gaming Headset, designed for competitive gamers and esports professionals. Featuring advanced Blue VO!CE microphone technology, it delivers crystal-clear communication, while its durable steel and aluminum frame ensures long-lasting comfort during intense gaming sessions. Immerse yourself in rich, immersive sound with custom-tuned 50mm drivers, giving you the edge to dominate every match. Elevate your gaming setup with this premium accessory that combines exceptional quality and performance.

products.name: Corsair K95 RGB Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: Elevate your gaming and productivity with the Corsair K95 RGB Mechanical Keyboard, engineered for enthusiasts who demand precision and durability. Featuring ultra-responsive Cherry MX switches and dynamic RGB backlighting customizable across six zones, this keyboard delivers both performance and stunning visuals. Its aircraft-grade aluminum frame ensures long-lasting resilience, while dedicated macro keys provide seamless control for complex commands. Ideal for gamers and professionals alike, the K95 combines premium quality with advanced functionality to enhance every keystroke.

products.name: Razer DeathAdder V3 Pro Mouse
products.description: Experience precision and comfort like never before with the Razer DeathAdder V3 Pro Mouse, designed for gamers and professionals demanding top-tier performance. Featuring an ultra-lightweight build, advanced optical sensor, and customizable buttons, it delivers lightning-fast responsiveness and ergonomic excellence for extended use. Elevate your gameplay or productivity with a mouse engineered to provide unparalleled accuracy and durability.

products.name: Xbox Series X Controller
products.description: Elevate your gaming experience with the Xbox Series X Controller, engineered for precision and comfort. Featuring a refined ergonomic design, textured grips, and a responsive hybrid D-pad, this controller delivers unparalleled control for both casual and competitive players. Compatible with Xbox Series X, Series S, and Windows PCs, it’s the perfect choice for gamers seeking premium performance and durability. Experience seamless gameplay with every move, designed to keep you in the game longer.

products.name: PlayStation DualSense Wireless Controller
products.description: Experience next-level gaming precision with the PlayStation DualSense Wireless Controller, designed to immerse players in every moment. Featuring advanced haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and a built-in microphone, this controller delivers unparalleled responsiveness and comfort for both casual and competitive gamers. Crafted with premium materials and ergonomic design, it ensures durability and long-lasting performance. Elevate your gameplay and feel every action like never before.

products.name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Headset
products.description: Experience unparalleled audio precision with the SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Headset, designed for gamers and audio enthusiasts seeking crystal-clear sound and supreme comfort. Featuring advanced wireless connectivity and immersive surround sound, this headset delivers exceptional clarity and responsiveness for competitive play or immersive media. Its durable, lightweight design ensures all-day comfort, while the high-quality microphone offers clear communication. Elevate your gaming experience with a headset engineered for performance and style.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air M2
products.description: Experience unparalleled performance and sleek design with the Apple MacBook Air M2, engineered for professionals and creatives on the go. Featuring the powerful M2 chip, a vibrant Retina display, and all-day battery life, this laptop delivers seamless multitasking and stunning visuals in an ultra-lightweight frame. Perfect for those who demand speed, portability, and premium quality, the MacBook Air M2 redefines efficiency without compromise. Elevate your productivity with a device that combines cutting-edge technology and elegant craftsmanship.

products.name: MSI Trident 3 Compact Gaming PC
products.description: Experience high-performance gaming in a sleek, space-saving design with the MSI Trident 3 Compact Gaming PC. Powered by the latest Intel processors and NVIDIA graphics, it delivers smooth gameplay and stunning visuals for both casual and competitive gamers. Its compact chassis fits effortlessly into any setup without compromising on cooling or upgrade potential. Perfect for gamers seeking power, portability, and premium quality in one stylish package.

products.name: Elgato Stream Deck MK.2
products.description: Elevate your content creation with the Elgato Stream Deck MK.2, the ultimate accessory for streamers, video editors, and digital creators. Featuring 15 customizable LCD keys, this intuitive control pad lets you execute complex commands, launch apps, and switch scenes with a single tap. Crafted for seamless integration and unmatched precision, the Stream Deck MK.2 enhances your workflow, empowering you to produce professional-quality content effortlessly. Experience the perfect blend of innovation and reliability designed to keep you in control.

products.name: Samsung Odyssey G7 27" Gaming Monitor
products.description: Elevate your gaming experience with the Samsung Odyssey G7 27'' Gaming Monitor, designed for serious gamers seeking immersive visuals and ultra-responsive performance. Featuring a stunning QHD resolution, 240Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time, this curved display delivers razor-sharp detail and seamless motion for competitive edge. With NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility and a sleek, ergonomic design, the Odyssey G7 ensures both exceptional graphics and comfort during marathon sessions. Perfect for enthusiasts who demand precision and style in every frame.

products.name: Logitech G29 Racing Wheel for PS3 and PS4
products.description: Aquafresh Advance toothpaste is specially designed by dental experts for children aged 9-12 years, and now comes with 0% artificial flavours and sweeteners, providing expert protection for new permanent teeth whilst being gentle on enamel. New permanent teeth are 50% more vulnerable to damage than adult teeth and can take up to 3 years to reach full strength. The low abrasive formula ensures gentle cleaning for your child�s teeth. It also provides 24hr sugar acid protection*. * Follow a healthy diet and brush twice daily with a fluoride toothpaste. Level of protection may decrease between brushing. Aquafresh Advance Kids toothpaste is designed by experts, trusted by parents and loved by kids, and provides lasting protection for new permanent teeth.

products.name: Ergonomic Gaming Chair With 2D Armrest - RED
products.description: No matter whether you’re gaming, browsing the web, or working on spreadsheets, will help you achieve the perfect position. This durable chair is constructed with high-quality long-lasting materials that can withstand even the most intense gaming sessions. Product Features: - 2D Lumbar support and backrest - Removable cushions in a stylish design. - Has 2D armrests built into all of its chairs giving you - In addition to its comfortable appearance with a weight capacity of up to 185 kilograms - With the adjustable backrest and height lever, this ergonomic chair will keep your body in a healthy position throughout long periods of use. Product Specifications: - Color options: Red, Blue, White - Measurements: 68.5 x 60 x 130 - 140 cm - Dimensions of the backrest: 54 x 13.5 x 85 cm - Dimensions of the seat: 55 x 51 x 45-55 cm

products.name: NVIDIA Geforce RTX3060 12GB DDR6
products.description: Arktek Nvidia Geforce RTX3060 DDR6 12GB 192Bit Twin Fans Graphics Card, also known as Hyperion Gaming, offers an exceptional gaming experience with its advanced features and high-performance capabilities. With 12GB of GDDR6 memory and a 192-bit memory interface, this graphics card ensures smooth, seamless gameplay and efficient processing of complex graphics data. Powered by the GeForce RTX 3060 GPU, Hyperion Gaming delivers superior graphics performance, allowing you to tackle even the most demanding games with ease. Its boost clock of 1777 MHz provides crisp, detailed visuals, enhancing your overall gaming experience. The card supports a maximum resolution of 7680 x 4320, offering ultra-high-definition clarity for immersive visuals. It is compatible with DirectX 12, which enhances gaming features and performance. PCI Express 4.0 support ensures faster data transfer rates, contributing to overall system efficiency. Additional technologies include NVIDIA GPU Boost for optimizing frame rates, NVIDIA SLI for multi-GPU setups, Adaptive V-Sync for smoother frame rendering, PhysX for dynamic effects, 3D Vision for stereoscopic 3D images, CUDA for increased computing performance and PureVideo HD Technology for superior video quality. The Hyperion Gaming graphics card is equipped with three DisplayPort and one HDMI port, providing versatile connectivity options to suit various display setups. An 8-pin power connector ensures stable power delivery for optimal performance.

products.name: Cudy AX3000 Gigabit Dual Band Wi-Fi 6 Mesh Router
products.description: Cudy AX3000 Gigabit Dual Band Wi-Fi 6 Mesh Router features a new Wi-Fi 6 chip with a 4-nm made process, delivering amazing powers and an impressive efficiency bump, enabling the AX3000 to maintain responsiveness and handle intensive transmission tasks such as online gaming streams and 4K live feeds. Equipped with Wi-Fi 6, the AX3000 boasts the highest 160Mhz bandwidth and 1024-QAM to reach up to 3Gbps speeds, which is more than 2.5x faster than the last-gen AC 2 2 Wi-Fi router. It features downlink and uplink MU-MIMO and OFDMA, providing up to 8X (2.4 GHz) to 16X (5 GHz) greater network capacity to be more responsive under heavy use. Specifications: Processor: 1.3 GHz Dual-Core ARM Cortex-A53 CPU. Antennas: 4 Fixed Omnidirectional Antennas. Ethernet Ports: 1 10/100/1000Mbps WAN Port and 3 10/100/1000Mbps LAN Ports. Buttons: WPS Button, Reset Button. External Power Supply: 12 V/1 A. Wireless Standards: IEEE 802.11ax/ac/n/a 5GHz, IEEE 802.11ax/n/b/g 2.4GHz. Wireless Bandwidth: 20/40/80/160 MHz. Signal Rate: 2402Mbps (5 GHz), 574Mbps (2.4 GHz) Compatible with 802.11a/b/g/n/ac Wi-Fi standards. Transmit Power: CE: 20 dBm (2.4 GHz), 23 dBm (5 GHz) and FCC: 30d Bm (2.4 GHz and 5 GHz). Wireless Modes: Enable/Disable Wireless Radio, WMM. Wireless security: WEP, WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK, WPA3. Other Features: MU-MIMO, Beamforming. VPN Server and Clinet: Wireguard/OpenVPN/L2TP/PPTP. DNS over TLS: Cloudflare/Google/Quad9. WAN Type: Dynamic IP/Static IP/PPPoE. DHCP: Server, DHCP Client List, Address Reservation. Dynamic DNS: Compatible with 15 more DDNS providers. Guest Network: 2.4 GHz guest network 1 and 5 GHz guest network 1. NAT: Port Forwarding, Port Triggering, UPnP, DMZ. System Requirements: Microsoft Windows, macOS, NetWare, UNIX or Linux, Firefox 12.0, Chrome 20.0, Safari 4.0 or other Javascript-enabled browsers. A Cable or DSL Modem or other devices providing wired internet. Subscription with an internet service provider for internet access.

products.name: Xbox Series S 1TB Video Game Console, Black
products.description: Experience next-gen speed and performance with Xbox Series S in Carbon Black, featuring a 1TB SSD. Xbox Velocity Architecture The Xbox Velocity Architecture, powered by a custom SSD, works together with the innovative system on a chip (SOC) technology to provide gameplay up to 120FPS. Quick Resume Seamlessly move between multiple game titles and resume instantly from where you left off. Expanding game library Whether you're looking for a day one launch title, one of over a hundred favourites in the Xbox Game Pass library, or any of thousands of backward compatible classics, there is always something to play on the all-digital Xbox Series S. ALL DIGITAL, ALL NEXT GEN Go all digital with the Xbox Series S and build a library of digital games. Enjoy the ability to pre-order and pre-install upcoming games so you re ready to play the moment they launch. GAME PASS ULTIMATE READY From Forza to FIFA, including EA Play benefits, Xbox Game Pass Ultimate brings over 100 high-quality titles to you. Get day one releases of blockbusters like Halo Infinite, and share the fray with friends with Xbox Live Gold. Add Xbox Game Pass Ultimate to get the most out of your Xbox Series S. Game Pass Ultimate subscription sold separately. QUICK RESUME Seamlessly switch between different titles and instantly resume from where you left off. FASTER LOAD TIMES Games load significantly faster with the custom SSD and integrated software. While ultra-low latency improves the response time from your controller to your TV. NEXT-GEN FRAMERATE Higher, steadier framerates at up to 120 FPS while playing. LISTEN, YOU ARE BEING SURROUNDED. 3D Spatial Sound is the next evolution in audio technology, using advanced algorithms to create immersive lifelike worlds that put you at the centre of your experience. DOLBY VISION AND ATMOS SUPPORT Xbox Series X|S are the first game consoles to support gaming in Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, which enhance gameplay with both full-spectrum visuals and immersive audio.(x) BACKWARD COMPATIBLE WITH THOUSANDS OF GAMES Get ready for faster load times, higher resolution, more stable frame rates and better input latency on thousands of Xbox One, Xbox 360 and Original Xbox games. COMPLETE CONTROL Get hands-on with the Xbox Wireless Controller, featuring our highest level of precision with a dedicated Share button and improved ergonomics. 4K STREAMING AND ENTERTAINMENT Access your favourite entertainment and stream 4K video on Disney+, Netflix, Amazon Prime and more.(x) PEACE OF MIND Easily manage your children's console activities all from your phone in real time with the Xbox Family Settings app. CARBON AWARE Xbox Series S is our first Xbox console ever to contain Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) plastics, while energy-saving power modes fine-tune your console when it's on or off. UPGRADE WITH EASE Bring your digital games and accessories with you from your Xbox One to your new Xbox Series S console SERIES S SPECS PROCESSOR CPU : 8X Cores @ 3.6 GHz (3.4 GHz w/SMT) Custom Zen 2 CPU GPU : 4 TFLOPS, 20 CUs @1.565 GHz Custom RDNA 2 GPU SOC Die Size : 197.05 mm2 MEMORY & STORAGE Memory: 10GB GDDR6 128 bit-wide bus Memory Bandwidth: 8 GB @ 224 GB/s, 2 GB @ 56 GB/s. Internal Storage : 512 GB Custom NVME SSD I/O Throughput : 2.4 GB/s (Raw), 4.8 GB/s (Compressed, with custom hardware decompression block) Expandable Storage : Support for 1TB Seagate Expansion Card for Xbox Series X|S matches internal storage exactly (sold separately). Support for USB 3.1 external HDD (sold separately). VIDEO CAPABILITIES Gaming Resolution : 1440p Performance Target : Up to 120 FPS HDMI Features : Auto Low Latency Mode. HDMI Variable Refresh Rate. AMD FreeSync. SOUND CAPABILITIES L-PCM, up to 7.1 | Dolby Digital 5.1 | DTS 5.1 | Dolby TrueHD with Atmos (x) PORTS & CONNECTIVITY HDMI : 1x HDMI 2.1 port USB : 3x USB 3.1 Gen 1 ports Wireless : 802.11ac dual band Ethernet : 802.3 10/100/1000 Accessories radio : Dedicated dual band Xbox Wireless radio IMPORTANT INFORMATION (x) 1) Game Pass Ultimate subscription sold separately 2) 120 FPS: Requires supported content and display; use on Xbox Series S as content becomes available. 3) 4K streaming with select apps, see xbox.com. Some apps require app provider-specific subscriptions and/or other requirements. 4) Dolby Atmos and DTS:X: may require additional purchases, app downloads, and supported hardware. 5) Dolby Vision & Atmos usage: Requires supported content, display, and sound device. Use on Xbox Series S as content becomes available. 6) Xbox Game Pass: Game catalogue varies over time (xbox.com/gamepass). Select regions and devices. Requires internet connection and downloads. 7) The console includes a 12-Month Manufacturer Warranty. Visit https://support.microsoft.com/ for additional support.
